Context: The George Brown College offers a postgraduate program in Sport and Event Marketing. The session to learn about the college and this program is 20 minutes long and can be attended online. Interested individuals can sign up to receive updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more. The contact details for enquiries are 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559, or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The college's social media hub can also be visited for additional information. Note that the information on this website is subject to change without notice. It is advised that students verify George Brown College fee requirements.
